mapper.select: select ENO, ETITLE, EISSUEDATE, EEXPIREDATE, EIMG from EVENT where ESTATUS =1
select ENO, ETITLE, EISSUEDATE, EEXPIREDATE, EIMG from EVENT where ESTATUS =0

select (select ECOUPONTITLE from event where event.eno = coupon_detail.eno) as ECOUPONTITLE , CPID,(select ECONTENT from event where event.eno = coupon_detail.eno) as ECONTENT, (select EDISCOUNT from event where event.eno = coupon_detail.eno) as EDISCOUNT ,CPISSUEDATE,CPEXPIREDATE,CPUSEDATE from coupon_detail where mid= #{MID} and CPEXPIREDATE>sysdate and cpusedate is null

select (select ECOUPONTITLE from event where event.eno = coupon_detail.eno) as ECOUPONTITLE , CPID,(select ECONTENT from event where event.eno = coupon_detail.eno) as ECONTENT, (select EDISCOUNT from event where event.eno = coupon_detail.eno) as EDISCOUNT ,CPISSUEDATE,CPEXPIREDATE,CPUSEDATE from coupon_detail where mid= #{MID} and cpusedate is not null

select (select ECOUPONTITLE from event where event.eno = coupon_detail.eno) as ECOUPONTITLE , CPID,(select ECONTENT from event where event.eno = coupon_detail.eno) as ECONTENT, (select EDISCOUNT from event where event.eno = coupon_detail.eno) as EDISCOUNT ,CPISSUEDATE,CPEXPIREDATE,CPUSEDATE from coupon_detail where mid= #{MID} and CPEXPIREDATE<sysdate and cpusedate is null
mapper.insert: insert into COUPON_DETAIL values ((select CONCAT('COU-PON-TEST',#{eno}) from event where ENO=#{eno}),#{eno},#{mid},(select EISSUEDATE from event where ENO =#{eno}),(select EEXPIREDATE from event where ENO =#{eno}),null,1)
